name: Dig 11' Epoxy Stand Up Paddleboard
description:
DIG are proud to release its brand new 11' epoxy. Like the 10' boards these are great for both river and surf and are wide enough to give stability but still great for intermediates. It is great for larger riders (good up to 160kg) or as a first board.

It has attractive wooden stringers and comes in a matte finish.

11' long
30" wide
4 5/8" deep

10.5kg in weight

Other details:

Tri fin set up (fins included - they are fibreglass not plastic) 

Left and right attachments points for your leash 

Carry handle sunk into deck 

Air Vent

This board has an EPS core, with 3 layers of Epoxy on the top and 2 on the bottom. These boards are not the cheaper soft top construction!

They carry riders up to 160kg/352bs

All these boards come with an EVA deckpad included.

options.name: 11' Paddleboard with all Carbon Paddle and leash

name: DIG 10' Epoxy Stand Up Paddleboard
description:
DIG are proud to release its brand new 10' epoxy. These boards are:

10' long
28" wide
4" deep

9.5kg in weight

and have a tri fin set up

This board has an EPS core, with 3 layers of Epoxy on the top and 2 on the bottom.

They carry riders up to 140kg/310lbs

They come with an EVA deckpad included and can be bought with an all carbon paddle for just Â£120 extra!

options.name: 10' Board with free 11' leash and all carbon paddle

name: Kayak / Surfboard / Paddleboard Roofrack
description:
This is a high quality, adjustable Kayak roofrack from DIG, has a universal fitting that is easy to fit onto any standard square bar.. 

Unlike many other kayak roofracks this can be folded flat when not in use. Its made of powder coated metal with thick pads and a rubber coated base to protect your kayak. 

It also comes with 2 flat grip bungee straps to keep your kayak secure on on your car

name: Kayak / Canoe Trolley - Heavy Duty
description:
This trolley is made from alloy with stainless steel fixings.

It has pneumatic tires, rubber protectors and carries single kayaks through to triples with no problem at all.

Also comes with a couple of flat grip bungee straps to keep your kayak secure on rough terrain and soft sand. 

These are absolutely essential if you need to move your kayaks any distance from car to water!

These trolleys also fold flat so you can take them with you in teh kayak.


Loading capacity approx 100KGS


Dimensions unfolded 68cm x 38cm x 36cm


Dimensions Folded 68cm x 38cm x 8cm

name: All Carbon SUP Paddles
description:
High Quality All Carbon Paddles 


These DIG paddles are all carbon - blade, paddle and palm grip. They come with 3 blade options and a carbon shaft that can be cut to your exact size. 
 
They are all ultra light but very durable and each models comes with a free blade guard.


The foam core in the blade comes from Sweden and is a high quality material that will not crack with prolonged exposure to the sun, unlike some paddles. With the paddles weighing in at just over 650g - 710g, these are so easy to use.


Size          Blade Size(W*H)                   Surface Area      Blade Angle 
Small        8" * 16.5"  /  20 *42cm         97 sq in            10 
Medium     8.6"*16.5"  /  22 *42cm        100 sq in          10 
Large        8.97"*17.3" /  22.8*44cm      106 sq in          12

name: DIG Single Kayak
description:
The DIG solo kayak is a great all round kayak for touring, surfing and all family fun and is as equally at home on the sea, lake or river.

This versatile kayak has a strong, tracking keel and smooth lines gives a great ride to paddlers of all abilities. It fits well on the car and is small enough to store easily.

The kayak comes fully loaded with contour moulded seat, self bailing system, moulded in foot rests and handles, strap attachment points and drain plug. It also has as standard  luxury seat with brass fittings, 2 stow hole with bags, bungees and stoppers for the drain holes.

Comes with good quality alloy paddle, so you are ready to get on the water.

Material:HDPE,UV Resistant 
Specs:293cm(L)*80cm(W)*34cm(H)
Weight: 23Kg

All our Kayaks come with a 5 year peace of mind warranty - see our warranty page for details.

name: DIG Double Kayak
description:
The DIG double kayak is a great all round kayak for touring, fishing and all family fun and is as equally at home on the sea, lake or river.

This is a big kayak, designed for comfort, with two moulded seats, moulded in footrests and handles, strap attachment points and drain plug. It also has as standard  two luxury seat with brass fittings, two stow holes with bag, bungees and stoppers for the drain holes.

It also comes with two, good quality, alloy oars so there is nothing else needed before you get on the water!

Material:HDPE,UV Resistant 
Specs:386cm(L)*85cm(W)*35cm(H)
Weight: 33Kg

These Kayaks are Collection Only due to size

All DIG kayaks come with a 5 year Peace of Mind Warranty. See the warranty page for details

name: DIG Treble Kayak
description:
The DIG treble kayak is a great all round family kayak for touring and family fun. It is equally at home on the sea, lake or river.
The Kayak has 2 good adult seats with a smaller seat in the middle.

The kayak comes fully loaded with contour moulded seat, self bailing system, moulded in foot rests and handles, strap attachment points and drain plug. It also has as standard  2 luxury seats with brass fittings, 2 stow hole with bags, bungees and stoppers for the drain holes.

Comes with 2 good quality alloy paddles, so you are ready to get on the water.

Available in Red / yellow mix, Yellow and Green
Material:HDPE,UV Resistant 
Specs:370cm(L)*86cm(W)*40cm(H)
Weight: 34Kg

Due to its size this is local collection only.

All DIG Kayaks come with a 5 year peace of mind warranty

name: DIG Stand Up Paddleboard
description:
Stand Up Paddleboarding has, up until now, been a difficult sport to get into owing to the high cost of equipment. DIG boards has now launched its new SUP which suits beginners through to experienced paddle boarders after greater versatility from their board.

The boards are PVC, meaning that there are no more cracked rails and you don't have to worry so much about hitting rocks and transporting.

The board design is very stable, easy to paddle and tracks well and whilst not specifically designed for surfing, it is more than capable.

The board sits quite high in the water making it a dry ride and with the storage hatch and bag, it makes it ideal for touring on rivers, fishing as well as on the open ocean. The bungees on the deck also allow you to store water bottles etc.
With grab handles at both ends, handles at the side as well as the centre hand hold, it is very easy to transport.

Comes complete with adjustable alloy paddle with extra Blade so you can use it as a kayak paddle.

Features:
- Super durable plastic construction 
- Storage compartment
- Built in keel
- Stackable
- SUP/ Kayak able
- Central and Carrying handles at both ends.
- Bungee deck storage

Material:HDPE,UV Resistant                         
Specs:290cm(L)*83cm(W)*20cm(H)
Weight: 20kg

All DIG PE Paddleboards come with a 5 year peace of mind warranty. See warranty page for details.

name: Fishing Rod Holder
description:
High Quality, deck mountable fishing rod holder.

This swivels 360 degrees and attachs securely to the deck using the bolts supplied
